content:
Q: Can I choose my preferred workshop for accident repairs?
A: HL Assurance Motor policy gives you the freedom to choose your own workshop in Singapore. However, if you choose to use our HL Assurance Approved Workshop for repair, you can be assured that genuine manufacturersâ€™ parts are used and it comes with a full 9 months repair warranty. Own Damage Excess will be halved if you choose to repair your vehicle at our HL Assurance Approved Workshop. To view the list of HL Assurance Approved Workshops, please click here .
questions: Does the HL Assurance Motor policy allow me to select my own workshop for car repairs?
What are the benefits of using an HL Assurance Approved Workshop for vehicle repairs?
Are genuine manufacturers' parts used at HL Assurance Approved Workshops?
Is there a repair warranty offered by HL Assurance Approved Workshops?
How long is the repair warranty provided by HL Assurance Approved Workshops?
What happens to the Own Damage Excess if I use an HL Assurance Approved Workshop?
Can I find a list of HL Assurance Approved Workshops online?
What is the duration of the repair warranty when using an HL Assurance Approved Workshop?
How does using an HL Assurance Approved Workshop affect my repair costs?
Where can I view the list of HL Assurance Approved Workshops?
